column4: need some help with nvidia driver.  I downloaded the latest nvidia driver, it compiled the new driver and installed it, but the current nvidia module has a different version so now X will not start.
you got it from their website?
yes
ok that's your problem then, those tend to brake, get it from the Ubuntu repo
thanx.
oh yeah and if you do an xfix in recovery mode
it should get rid of the other one
thanx again...I dont seem to have xfix
the Grub recovery mode
the boot loader
ahhh.. ok
no probs
whats the apt command for getting the nvidia driver from the repo??
don't know, but once you done the xfix
system >  administration > hardware drivers
Ok did xfix rebooting seems to be working....thanx.
no probs
but now to get my resolutions back....argh
yes when you do the repo driver,  you should get them back
still haveing problems after system->hardware drivers.  I still have the new driver so its not downloading the correct one.  At least thats what I think
oh
so how do I delete the driver ... where is it so I can delete it.
don't know
well it will be under synaptic I guess
